title: The Devil Hidden in the Tennis Court

infobox.Title:: The Devil Hidden in the Tennis Court
infobox.Japanese title:: テニスコートに潜む悪魔  (Tenisu Kōto ni Hisomu Akuma)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Sonoko Suzuki  Misao Yamamura
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Nobuyuki Iwai (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Toshio Furukawa as Misao Yamamura  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Kozo Mito as Police detective  Tomokazu Sugita as Takao Goto  Yukana as Yuka Tsuchida  Tomoko Ishimura as Chie Otake  Shuhei Sakaguchi as Fumihiro Azuma  Hayato Nakata as Takao's partner

sections.Situation: Ran and Sonoko brought Conan to an indoor tennis court. While Ran and Sonoko are playing tennis, Conan goes to the bathroom. As he is leaving, he hears a slap from the next room. He peeks into the room and see's a man named Takao Goto and a woman named Yuka Tsuchida arguing. Apparently Yuka is angry that Goto invited Sonoko as she thinks he wants to ditch her for Sonoko. As he apparently fixes everything up with her he leaves. She starts kicking the lockers saying, "Don't you dare leave me!" Meanwhile, Ran is looking for Conan where she meets one of the spectators named Fumihiro Azuma, who tells her he went to the restroom. Goto collapses in the middle of the match due to poisoning and is rushed to the hospital. Who is the culprit?
